show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
It’s the Last Open Forum for the Year: Speak Now, Or Until 2014 Hold Your Peace! <!--more-->

 It’s fitting that we should end the year with listeners’ thoughts, opinions, observations, insights and wisdom.
It’s the last Open Forum for 2013.
Share what’s on your mind – whether looking back at a tumultuous year or looking ahead at the dawning of a new one.
It’s your forum.
As usual, you take the conversation wherever you want it to go.
